revised_title: Observations of Parched Pasture, Oak Trees, and Brackish Water in Somerset
tldr: Dr. Beale observed and documented unusual occurrences in Somerset during a drought, such as withered and parched pasture growing the shape of trees, blackened oak trees, and a brackish pool. These observations may be instructive for other regions facing similar challenges.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Soil Science
